Text: I will also up a 23.97 fps version if anyone wants it.  I know some have had issues playing the higher frame rates on some equipment.
Would love to se a 23.97 fp version. Love the move and if you could upload the lower fps-rate version that would be awsome. Thanks in advance
Where are the sync problems?  I don't see it in my copy.  I still have the source so I can fix if you tell me where to look.
yeah, def sync issues starting at the 5 min mark. Tried MPC and WMP. I'm using the latest CCC pack and I also tried it on my powerhouse of a desktop with the same problem on the same time

I'm playing in VLC and in Mediaportal.  Not sseing the issue, but I'm going to assume this is a problem with the 60fps framerate.  The 24fps version I posted is identical source and same quality.  No complaints posted there about the A/V sync problem.
Could you upload a subbed version? English or Norwegian subs if possible :)
